title: Automatic code linting and formatting
body:
<!--- This template provides sections for bugs and features. Please delete any irrelevant sections before submitting -->

<!--- Required. Describe the behavior you expect to see for your case. -->

Automatic code formatting

#### Actual Behavior
<!--- Required. Describe the actual behavior for your case. -->

Currently developper need to take care of code formatting which would probably be better developpers invested time if that was automated

#### Potential Solution
<!--- Optional. Describe any potential solutions and/or thoughts as to what may be causing the difference between expected and actual behavior. -->

using a code formatter / linter such as https://csharpier.com/ could help to have well formated code

Such tool could be event be integrated as part of a continuous integration or as a pre-commit hook
